credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
title: Kremlin Service
provenance: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Circular form, the center decorated with black, double-headed imperial eagle on green ground within a circular band of Cirillic lettering (translation: Nicholas the Emperor and Ruler of All the Russias), surrounded by decoration of red flowers in gilded lozenges alternating with green foliate forms; the rim with green and blue foliage intertwined with black scrollwork on gilded ground.
name: Dessert plate
